task: SCAFFOLD a simple Tasks frontend UI

plannerResult.raw_task: SCAFFOLD a simple Tasks frontend UI

subtasks.name: bootstrap-ui-shell
subtasks.objective: Set up the initial frontend project structure, app entrypoint, basic navigation, and global layout with placeholder route for Tasks.

subtasks.name: tasks-state-model
subtasks.objective: Define a simple Task model, in-memory mock store, and action handlers for add/edit/toggle/delete operations used by the UI.

subtasks.name: tasks-components
subtasks.objective: Implement core UI components for listing tasks, creating a task, marking complete, and deleting, with clean prop/state wiring and minimal styling.

subtasks.name: final-integration
subtasks.objective: Integrate components into the app screen, connect to state layer, add quick smoke checklist, and document how to run the scaffold.
